snippet: There are better ways for the mayor to use his time and resources to combat obesity in New York City than to ban giant sugary drinks.
abstract: Editorial acknowledges New York State judge's rejection of New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg's ban on servings of sugary drinks larger than 16 ounces was necessary; says ban was ill conceived and poorly constructed; outlines some better ways for Bloomberg and health officials to combat obesity.
lead_paragraph: There are better ways for the mayor to use his time and resources to combat obesity in New York City than to ban giant sugary drinks.
